item.title: Help Cards
item.description: SOPs siLib Turbulize Attribute VOPs siLib Turbulize

item.title: siLib Turbulize Attribute SOP
item.description: Lets you add noise to an attribute using one of 5 types of FBM based noise. The range of the noise is kept consistent regardless of the values of octaves and roughness. It also avoids the issues that built-in noise nodes have for input positions located around {0, 0, 0}. This page also gives details on the corresponding VEX noise functions that you can use in your own VEX code.

item.title: siLib Turbulize VOP
item.description: Lets you add noise to an attribute using one of 5 types of FBM based noise. The range of the noise is kept consistent regardless of the values of octaves and roughness. It also avoids the issues that built-in noise nodes have for input positions located around {0, 0, 0}. This page also gives details on the corresponding VEX noise functions that you can use in your own VEX code.
